description: This sweet and sticky hoisin pork is a great takeaway alternative and can be left to cook gently in the slow cooker.
name: Slow Cooker Hoisin Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.8 cup hoisin sauce, save 2 tsp for later

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a pan on medium heat and seal the pork on all sides until lightly browned. Place in the slow cooker.

Heat the rest of the oil and cook the onion for 5 minutes to soften. Add the ginger, chilli, 5 spice and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Pour in the hoisin sauce, maple syrup and sherry and cool for 1 minute. Tip into the slow cooker.
Cook on high with the lid on for 4 hours until tender.
